mapper.sql: uuid, name, create_time, update_time, flag, up_id, pic, community_id
mapper.select:
select from tb_classification where
name like CONCAT(#{name}, '%') and
up_id = #{upId} and
community_id = #{communityId} and
flag = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_classification (uuid, name, create_time, update_time, flag, up_id, pic, community_id) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

uuid,
name,

up_id,
pic,
community_id,

mapper.update:
update tb_classification
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
up_id = #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
